original_definition: 'full activation time' means the period between the activation request by the connecting TSO in case of TSO-TSO model or by the contracting TSO in case of TSO-BSP model and the corresponding full delivery of the concerned product;
generated_definition: 'full activation time' means the time by which the full functionality of a product or system is expected to be available for use, as specified in the relevant legislation or technical standards.

Article 2: ‘full activation time’ means the period between the activation request by the connecting TSO in case of TSO-TSO model or by the contracting TSO in case of TSO-BSP model and the corresponding full delivery of the concerned product;
